title: eMiNENT
body:
eMiNENT is looking for players
Players interested in making a serious competitive team apply below. The purpose of the team is to bring gold/platinum players together to improve as a team and make a genuine effort to get into the competitive scene
Players are expected to practice atleast 3 days a week for 4 hours excluding one day of replay reviewing with a coach every week. Players are expected to gradually improve and make a effort to increase skill level over time, laziness will not be rewarded and 
players may get replaced if sufficient play time is not seen. Trials are to be started when enough applications are submitted. 3 Flexible subs capable of filling any roles are also needed.
Players are required to fill out contact info and avaiability times on a google document. If anyone is interested in trialling please fill out the form below and we will be in contact. Thanks.
https://docs.google.com/forms/d/17tWa5PzAtI12YEBWA1gjcBduJKi--7UKaNU1N_o8Ewo/viewform
